title: The end of self-custodial wallets
description:
This talk provides a quick overview of how countries worldwide restrict or plan to ban the self-custodial ownership model, which is the foundation of cryptocurrencies.

- What kind of laws, regulations and guidance countries have passed to restrict self-custodial
- What kind of areas are being targeted: ownership of cryptocurrencies, wallets, developers, interfaces
- Who are the driving forces behind opposing self-custodial
- How to counteract this development
